def get_segs(dur):
    # keep first 5s of each 20s,
    # keep entire last segment
    ofs = 0
    segs = []
    while True:
        seg = [ofs, 5]
        segs.append(seg)
        if dur - ofs < 20:
            seg[-1] = int(dur - seg[0])
            break

        ofs += 20

    return segs
